name: Rhythm Hero
description:
Mouse like a joystick


Rhythm Hero is a game where you can play with only mouse clicks and wheel clicks in a hexagonal space. You can play with your mouse like a joystick.

story


You can enjoy the game even more with the fusion of rhythm game and visual novel, interesting story.

Dozens of songs and stages


You can play the game with numerous genres of songs tailored to the stage and story.
